name: mikroe.click.mcp2518fd
short_description: MCP2518FD click is a complete CAN solution, which can be used as a control node in a CAN network. The Click boardâ„¢ is used to provide the microcontroller (MCU) with unrestricted access to the CAN network bus. MCP2518FD click is equipped with both the control logic and the physical interface ICs.
